message.content:
Below is a concise worked‐through solution in three parts (analysis of the target, block‐dictionary matches, and a suggested build order).

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
1)  TARGET‐IMAGE ANALYSIS
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
• Overall Count & Layers:
  – There are 10 total blocks.  
  – They form two substructures:
    1. Left “T‐shaped” tower (3 blocks).  
    2. Right “bridge” assembly (7 blocks) in three layers.

• Left Substructure (3 blocks):
  1. A small vertical yellow cylinder at the base.  
  2. A tall green rectangular prism standing upright in front of it.  
  3. A horizontally laid orange cylinder resting on top, forming a “T” shape.

• Right Substructure (7 blocks, arranged in 3 layers):
  – Layer 1 (bottom): Two red arch blocks side by side.  
  – Layer 2 (middle):  
      • Two upright green blocks, one atop each red arch.  
      • One more identical green block set behind the right‐hand arch.  
  – Layer 3 (top): Two tall yellow rectangular prisms placed on the two green blocks that sit directly over the arches.

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
2)  SELECTING BLOCKS FROM THE DICTIONARY
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Matching each piece (without re‐orienting it) yields:

• Red arch blocks (bottom layer on the right):
  – Use dictionary index #1 (arched front) twice.

• Green upright rectangular blocks:
  – Use dictionary index #5 for all four green pillars (one on the left tower, three on the right).

• Tall yellow rectangular blocks (on top, right substructure):
  – Use dictionary index #7 for the two tall yellow prisms.

• Small yellow cylinder (vertical) in the left substructure:
  – Use dictionary index #13.

• Orange cylinder (horizontal) on top of the left tower:
  – Use dictionary index #12.

In total:
  – #1 used 2 times  
  – #5 used 4 times  
  – #7 used 2 times  
  – #12 used 1 time  
  – #13 used 1 time  

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
3)  STEP‐BY‐STEP ASSEMBLY INSTRUCTIONS
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
{
  Step1: Move block with index 1       (place first red arch, right substructure)
  Step2: Move block with index 1       (place second red arch, right substructure)
  Step3: Move block with index 5       (place green pillar behind right arch)
  Step4: Move block with index 5       (place green pillar on left arch)
  Step5: Move block with index 5       (place green pillar on right arch)
  Step6: Move block with index 7       (place tall yellow block on left green pillar)
  Step7: Move block with index 7       (place tall yellow block on right green pillar)
  Step8: Move block with index 13      (place small yellow cylinder, left substructure)
  Step9: Move block with index 5       (place upright green block in front of that cylinder)
  Step10: Move block with index 12     (lay orange cylinder horizontally on top)
}

These ten moves produce the exact arrangement shown in the target image without any block rotations beyond those given in the dictionary.
